MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 postcode area of Brynteg, affecting properties in Victoria gardens, Wrexham Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:49PM. Our engineers have arrived on site  and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:38PM on 31st March 2021.
